public class SHPObserver

implements Observer

    • checkScheduled

      public boolean checkScheduled​(java.lang.String current, java.lang.String scheduled)
      Checks if the current time is within the scheduled time.
      Parameters:
      current - String The current time.
      scheduled - String the Scheduled time in the form (fromTime:ToTime)
      Returns:
      true if the current time is withing the scheduled time; False otherwise.

    • update

      public void update​(Observable o)
      Updates the observers by checking if there are people in the house when away mode is on. (Needs to also check for automated lights)
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - the Observable object that is observed by this Observer.
